item.description:
Sichuan Garden is one of Boston's most famous Chinese restaurant in Boston. This will be our first gathering in this place, which is easily reachable by public transportation. It is located in Brookline Village (green D line).

This is the website for Sichuan Garden:

http://www.sichuangar...

This is the address:

295 Washington St, Brookline, MA, 02446


After lunch, we will head off to a free classical music concert a few blocks from the restaurant in Hunneman Hall in Brookline Main Library. Concert starts at 3pm. If you haven't been to a concert before this will be a cool chance to experience it for free

For more information about the concert and location please visit this site:

http://scyue1.googlep...

Afterwards we can improvise what to do...maybe have a short walk up to Coolidge Corner for an ice cream or a drink!

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Lunch and concert
